sqlMap.select: SELECT seq, model_code, model_name, filename, open_date, to_char(write_date ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS write_date, write_ip, make_comp, state_chk FROM PHONEMODEL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PHONEMODEL(seq, model_code, model_name, filename, make_comp, state_chk, open_date) VALUES(model_seq.nextval, #model_code#, #model_name#, '없음', #make_comp#, #state_chk# , '2013-01-28')
